Everett.Marysville Arts & Technology High School:
Arts and technology high school, located in Marysville, Washington, USA, Arts and Technology High School is a public secondary school for grades 9-12 and is part of the Marysville School District. School days are organized into seven periods.


== A & T Graduation requirements ==
A & T offers a four-year program of study in core academic areas: Humanities, History, Arts, Math, Science, Business, and Technology.
